div.p: Sensitivity of the 99.9th percentile of daily precipitation to global-mean surface temperature for climate change under the RCP8.5 scenario in CMIP5 global climate-model simulations. Shown are the multimodel median ( green line with circles) and the full model range ( dotted lines). Also shown are sensitivities inferred by constraining the model sensitivities using observations of tropical variability ( black line) with a 90Â % confidence interval obtained by bootstrapping as in [ 58] ( gray shading)
